DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate small bowel lesion pattern associate celecoxib alone versus ibuprofen plus omeprazole
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Small Bowel Lesions Associated With Celecoxib Versus Ibuprofen Plus Omeprazole
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Normal , healthy gastrointestinal tract ( small bowel mucosal break Day 14 accord endoscopic data No history GI ulcer , bleed surgery , complete partial stenosis small intestine Willing drink alcohol study period Exclusion criterion : Has establish delay gastric empty diabetic gastroparesis Has active gastroesophageal reflux disease require antiulcer medication Has take aspirin nonsteroidal antinflammatory drug ( ibuprofen , naproxen ) 3 time per week within 2 week prior screen visit ; aspirin cardiovascular prophylaxis restrict
